title: NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) has risen 1.23% Friday In Premarket Trading
text:
NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) has risen Friday morning, with the stock increasing 1.23% in pre-market trading to 890.3. 


NVDA's short-term technical score of 91 indicates that the stock has traded more bullishly over the last month than 91% of stocks on the market. In the Semiconductors industry, which ranks 90 out of 146 industries, the stock ranks higher than 96% of stocks.

NVIDIA Corp has risen 21.93% over the past month, closing at $726.13 on February 16. During this period of time, the stock fell as low as $674.72 and as high as $974.00. NVDA has an average analyst recommendation of Strong Buy. The company has an average price target of $850.77.





 NVDA has an Overall Score of 80. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on NVDA!
See Full NVDA Report



NVIDIA Corp has a Long-Term Technical rank of 97. This means that trading over the last 200 trading days has placed the company in the upper half of stocks with 3% of the market scoring higher. In the Semiconductors industry which is number 56 by this metric, NVDA ranks better than 56% of stocks.



Important Dates for Investors in NVDA:


-NVIDIA Corp is set to release earnings on 2024-05-21. Over the last 12 months, the company has reported EPS of $11.94.


-We do not have a set dividend date for NVIDIA Corp at this time.
